contentrichtext.text: {{TOCright}} '''Mag''' and similar can mean: ==As an abbreviation== *[[Magi]] *Short for 'Magpies', the nickname for supporters of [[Newcastle United]] *[[Magazine (disambiguation)]], "magazine" in its various meanings *[[Magnum (disambiguation)]] *[[Magnet]] *[[Magnification]], in optical devices *[[Magneto]], an engine ignition system component (typically in the context of aviation) *[[Magnesium alloy wheel]]s, commonly called 'mags' *[[Magnetometer]], an instrument for measuring magnetic field strength and direction *Monoacylglycerol, also known as [[monoglyceride]], a lipid ==Acronyms== * [[metal active gas welding]] *[[mobilkom Austria]] Group *[[Manchester Airports Group]], a holding company operating Manchester Airport and three others *[[Maricopa Association of Governments]], a regional council of governments representing the Phoenix, Arizona metro area *[[FN MAG]] machine gun *a Magnetic Accelerator Gun, such as a [[Gauss gun]] *[[MAG (video game)]], a PlayStation 3 video game *[[Maximum Absorbency Garment]], a diaper-like garment worn by astronauts during lift-off and spacewalks *Men's [[artistic gymnastics]] *[[Memorial Art Gallery]], an art museum in Rochester, New York *[[Mines Advisory Group]], a non-governmental organization concerned with the removal of war debris *[[Motorcycle Action Group]], a motorcycle riders' rights group in the United Kingdom *[[Myelin-associated glycoprotein]] ==Other== *[[MAG (cryptography)]], a stream cypher *[[Madang Airport]], which has the IATA code MAG *[[MAG Technology Co.]], a company making computer display devices *[[Mog (people)]], a secluded tribe in the Indian state of Tripura whose name is sometimes transliterated Mag * Mag ({{lang-hu|Mág}}), a village in [[Săliște]] town, Sibiu County, Romania *a helpful, familiar-like companion robot in the game ''[[Phantasy Star Online]]'' {{disambig}}
